title: Susanna Reid 'unrecognisable' as GMB hosts share embarrassing school snaps

Susanna Reid shared her old school photo on today's Good Morning Britain - and looked 'unrecognisable'.

The GMB hosts were sharing their snaps after discussing the latest trend of parents photoshopping pictures of their kids.

Susanna attempted to sneakily get out of it, but was caught out by her co-hosts and forced to put up the photo.

There were stunned gasps in the studio when Susanna's pic came up on-screen - with Richard Arnold comparing her to American actress Andi MacDowell.

While shocked Adil Ray shouted: "Wait, what, whoa. How old...? What. Is that you?"

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Some This Morning viewers were convinced that Susanna's picture had been taken 'during the war'.

The touched up version of her photo gave her a "full face of make-up".

Susanna said: "Good hair I think actually. Apparently the retouchers decided I needed a full face of make up.

"I've got a rosy tint to my lip there and I think they may have plucked my eyebrows."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Good Morning Britain viewers took to Twitter after seeing Susanna's old school photo.

One fan said: "You've barely changed, Susanna :-) xx"

"She looks older on her school photo than she does today," added another.

A third said: "Looks like a pic from during the war."

"Is Susanna’s picture from 1908," said a fourth.

*Good Morning Britain airs weekdays on ITV at 6am
description: Good Morning Britain viewers were convinced Susanna's photo had been taken 'during the war'
